articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Introduce Latest War Hardware
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Introduce Latest War Hardware
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released information bulletin No. 1056 on Thursday rapping the ever-more desperate moves of the south Korean puppet authorities to introduce latest war hardware.
					 The information bulletin said:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are mulling spending a stupendous amount of fund to introduce latest U.S.-made war hardware including F-35A, Global Hawk, CH-47D and various type missiles. 
					
					 Meanwhile, they are contemplating massively introducing latest war hardware such as long-range air-to-ground guided missiles and reconnaissance planes from Germany, France and other countries in the wake of deployment of hundreds of precision guided missile Spike from Israel. 
					
					 The above-said actions are sparking  off deep concern and denunciation at home and abroad as they are reckless moves to escalate military confrontation and arms race on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia and aggravate the regional situation. 
					
					 Those moves of the south Korean regime are pursuant to the scenario of the U.S. to put it under its tighter military control and use it as a shock brigade for carrying out its Asian strategy and, at the same time,  amount to yielding to the U.S. pressure for buying more war hardware. 
					
					 All facts clearly indicate that the U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities are the arch criminals disturbing peace and security on the peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities are making desperate efforts to make up for their inferiority by dint of superiority in technical equipment, taken aback by the tremendous military muscle of the DPRK. However, this is as foolish an act as precipitating their self-destruction. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will never pardon the moves of the puppet group to escalate the military confrontation and resolutely foil them with the might of Songun.

articles.title: Indian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Indian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Ajay Kumar Sharma, Indian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Thursday in celebration of the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister; Pak Kun Gwang, vice-department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea; Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs; Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as vice-chairman of the DPRK-India Friendship Association; and officials concerned and foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here.
					
					 Present there were staff members of the Indian embassy here.
					
					 Ajay Kumar Sharma in a speech at the reception said that India values the traditional and friendly relations with the DPRK.
					
					 He noted that the Indian people are admiring President Kim Il Sung, the eternal leader of the Korean people.
					
					 He expressed the will to make efforts to contribute to boosting the bilateral friendly relations.
					
					 Pak Ui Chun said that the DPRK is rejoiced over the fact that the Indian government and people have registered great achievements in the efforts to build a strong state.
					
					 He noted that it is the steadfast stand of the government of the DPRK to value and strengthen the bilateral friendly and cooperative ties associated with the noble feats of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK will continue to boost the bilateral ties in the political, economic, cultural and various other fields in keeping with the common interests and desire of the two peoples, he stressed.

articles.title: National Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Art Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- A national art exhibition  opened on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the exhibition are fine art pieces depicting immortal revolutionary career and noble and popular traits of Kim Jong Il including Korean painting "Sprit of a Thriving Nation", oil painting "General Kim Jong Il, Brilliant Songun Commander" and "Visiting Sentries in the Forefront".
					
					 Also on display there are works showing the spirit of the Korean people translating the behests of Kim Jong Il into reality. They include Korean painting "Kosan Fruit Farm", "Speed on Masik Pass Sweeping across the Country" and poster "Let's Turn Sepho Tableland into a Large-sized Stockbreeding Base!"
					
					 An opening ceremony was held at the Korean Art Gallery on Thursday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, An Tong Chun, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of the Unions of Art and Literature of Korea, officials concerned and those of ministries and national institutions, artists and youth and students in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Members of Working People's Organizations Meet
articles.content:
Members of Working People's Organizations Meet
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Working people's organizations held meetings on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il Thursday.
					 Workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea held a meeting to make a resolution at the Central Hall of Workers, agricultural workers at the Mangyongdae Vegetable Farm in Mangyongdae District and members of the women's union at the Hall of Women. 
					
					 Reports were made at the meetings to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Reporters and speakers said that Kim Jong Il successfully led the Korean revolution by dint of the might of Songun and put the dignity of Juche Korea and its national power on a high level, performing immortal feats for the country and the nation, the era and the history.
					
					 His life was the most brilliant one of an outstanding revolutionary and peerless patriot who ushered in the world of patriotic devotion with his iron will and superhuman efforts, holding high the red flag of the revolution, they noted.
					
					 They underscored the need to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever and step up the building of a thriving nation, rallied close around supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They called for working hard to build an economic power and a highly civilized socialist nation with the revolutionary faith and the might of single-minded unity further consolidated through the enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea guided by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the meetings were Ri Yong Su, department director of the WPK Central Committee, officials concerned and those of working people's organizations, workers, members of trade unions, agricultural workers and members of the women's union.

articles.title: DPRK Sees Achievements in Bionics
articles.content:
DPRK Sees Achievements in Bionics
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Bioengineering Branch of the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK has made successes in scientific researches.
					 Genome scientists succeeded in developing DNA microarray for detection of pathogenic microorganism in water and food, DNA microarray for detection of M. tuberculosis and non-M. tuberculosis microorganism and DNA microarray for detection of M. tuberculosis resistant to drug.
					
					 Micro-bionics scientists succeeded in developing Interleukin-2 (IL-2), paving a way for preventing cancer with immunity agents.
					
					 Meanwhile, they developed a technology of separated cultivation of species of stem cells, including mesencymal stem cell as well as a technology of grafting dwarf apples on the basis of tissue culture.
					
					 Kye In Chol, vice chief of the Bioengineering Branch, told KCNA: 
					
					 The branch is now faced with many things to be settled in agriculture, fishing farming, public health and other fields.
					
					 Its scientists are sure to settle all of them since they are in high spirits to take the lead in developing up-to-the-minute technologies.

articles.title: Derricks Operate at Phyongchon Wharf in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Derricks Operate at Phyongchon Wharf in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Two derricks began operating at Phyongchon Wharf, located in the River Taedong here.
					 Cha Song Gun, chief engineer of the Pyongyang Marine Transport Company, told KCNA that the derricks would further activate transport in the River Taedong.
					
					 Beginning in late October, the assembling of derricks came to an end in a little more than one month.
					
					 With their operation, the wharf is able to raise its cargo handling capacity quintuple.

articles.title: Collective Technical Workshop Held
articles.content:
Collective Technical Workshop Held
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- There took place a collective technical workshop for the participants in the great workshop for officials in the field of construction in Pyongyang from Dec. 10 to 12.
					 It dealt with the theoretical and practical issues arising in deeply grasping the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the field of construction and the validity and vitality of the Workers' Party of Korea's idea of Juche-based architectural beauty and ushering in the period of great prosperity in construction, true to the far-sighted plan of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There also took place video lectures aimed to help the participants acquire wide-ranging insight and knowledge about architecture, including the prospect and goal of city construction of the country, stage-by-stage construction plans, world trend of architectural development, latest designing technology and advanced construction methods.
					
					 Then followed a lecture on the basic contents of Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Usher in the Period of Great Prosperity in Construction by Thoroughly Embodying Party's Idea on Juche-based Architecture".
					
					 Premier Pak Pong Ju referred to the basic requirements and ways for ushering in the new period of great prosperity in construction by applying the Juche-based idea on architectural beauty.
					
					 The basic requirements are to set objects directly linked with the people's living as the main orientation, erect more buildings and build structures surpassing the world's level.
					
					 He called for steadily creating a new speed of construction startling the world and thus fully demonstrating the spirit and might of Songun Korea advancing faster to attain higher goals.
					
					 Kim Sok Jun, director of the State Design Guidance Bureau, raised important issues arising in working out the master plan for land and city construction and ways for thoroughly carrying it out.
					
					 Ma Won Chun, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said that personnel in the field of design should create any design as a world-level one with a strong sense of responsibility that the self-respect of the nation and its spirit are reflected in architecture and thereby fully demonstrate the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 Kim In Sik, vice-premier and chairman of the Capital City Construction Commission, underscored the need to decisively raise the quality of construction.
					
					 Pae Tong Il, president of Pyongyang University of Architecture, said in order to make building materials locally available, it is necessary to round off the existing production processes of building material factories, increase their capacities and thus meet the demands for ordinary building materials and improve their quality.
					
					 Kwon Song Ho, minister of State Construction Control, said that officials should be well aware of the norms and regulations of construction law and make it part of their life and habit to work as required by them.

articles.title: DPRK People Determined to Remain Loyal Only to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
DPRK People Determined to Remain Loyal Only to Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- As already reported, the chance and alien elements who had made their ways into the Workers' Party of Korea committed anti-party, counter-revolutionary factional acts. They expanded their forces through factional moves and dared challenge the party while attempting to undermine the unitary leadership of the party.
					 In this regard, KCNA had an interview with teachers and students of Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 Paek Chol, an official of the university, said:
					
					 The purge of the Jang Song Thaek group of anti-party and counter-revolutionary elements made our party and revolutionary ranks purer.
					
					 It is the height of folly for them, bereft of elementary sense of moral obligation and conscience, to dare undermine the single-minded unity provided by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A sledgehammer blow should be delivered at anyone who goes against the single-minded unity of our people around supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The recent case has hardened the people's will to remain loyal only to him.
					
					 Pak Kum Sun, a teacher, said:
					
					 The group's acts remind me of the past in which some anti-party, counter-revolutionary factionists who had sneaked into the revolutionary ranks challenged the party whenever the Korean revolution was undergoing trials.
					
					 The purge of the group represents public mindset to invariably follow the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 No one can dampen their strong will to hold him in high esteem as the center of unity and leadership.
					
					 Sim Kang Sik, a student, said:
					
					 The single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses based on the great idea is the most precious treasure that can be bartered with nothing.
					
					 No matter how the situation may change, I will follow Kim Jong Un only.

articles.title: DPRK People's Yearning for Kim Jong Il Grows Deeper with Snowfall
articles.content:
DPRK People's Yearning for Kim Jong Il Grows Deeper with Snowfall
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- There has been a heavy fall of snow here on Wednesday and Thursday.
					 The snowfall deepens the Korean people's yearning for leader Kim Jong Il, who left them amid heavy snowfall two years ago.
					
					 On the day of the ceremony of bidding the last farewell to him, citizens took off their clothes and put them on the snow-covered streets where the hearse was passing.
					
					 In fact leader Kim Jong Il had made a ceaseless journey of field guidance for the wellbeing of the people, in disregard of weather conditions, until the last moments of his life. Though he was in bad health condition in December 2011, he continued his field guidance.
					
					 The Korean people had always wished him good health, singing such songs as "Where Are You, Dear General?" and "We Believe in You as in Heaven".
					
					 Witnessing the snowfall, they are now hardening their will to carry out Kim Jong Il's behests on building a thriving socialist nation without fail, under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: No Room for Factionists to Live in: News Analyst
articles.content:
No Room for Factionists to Live in: News Analyst
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are now stepping up the general march towards the final victory in the drive for the building of a thriving nation, getting closely united around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 In the course of achieving the unity of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolutionary ranks on a high level, the recent enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK fully laid bare the anti-party, counter-revolutionary factional acts of the chance elements and alien elements who had made their ways into the party.
					
					 The meeting held on December 8 dealt a decisive blow at dangerous factional acts by resolutely purging Jang Song Thaek and his group that dared expand its forces in the party to challenge the party in a bid to undermine the unitary leadership of the party in the historic period of carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The purge of the present-day factionists is inevitability of history.
					
					 Committing factional acts only leads to splitting the revolutionary ranks and helping the enemy of the revolution.
					
					 From its outset, the Korean revolution has witnessed the uncompromising struggle against factionists harming the unity of the revolutionary ranks, and only victories with the history of the unity.
					
					 The DPRK army and people are now advancing toward the rosy future of a thriving socialist nation, single-heartedly rallied around Kim Jong Un. In this new era of the Juche revolution, there is no room for a handful of political careerists and factionists to live in.
					
					 The Korean people followed President Kim Il Sung only with absolute trust in him in difficult days of the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953) and postwar rehabilitation in which factionists became evermore vicious in their moves against the WPK. During the Arduous March, the forced march, they cheerfully broke through manifold hardships with a firm conviction that the rosy future was in store only when they were guided by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people dealt heavy blows to the counter-revolutionary factionists going against the WPK in the last century. They have further cemented the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks after turning the bitter sorrow at the loss of the President into strength and courage with a firm determination as shown by the song "Hold High the Red Flag".
					
					 The tradition of the single-minded unity has creditably been carried forward by the coming generations.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered in Mt. Paektu is successfully making a progress under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, who keeps in his mind the brilliant traditions provided by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu as the lifeline, most precious property and permanent lineage of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The single-minded unity is the mainstay for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. The purge of the factionists who challenged the party and revolution, country and people makes the unity of the revolutionary ranks purer and closer.
					
					 Invincible is the harmonious whole of the party, army and people, closely rallied around the leader with the same idea and will.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Forces Accused of Escalating Confrontation: News Analyst
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Forces Accused of Escalating Confrontation: News Analyst
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The present ruling forces of south Korea have kicked up a whirlwind of confrontation with the DPRK unprecedented in history under the signboard of "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" since they came to power.
					They have tried hard to cover up the confrontation policy craftier than Lee Myung Bak's "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" with the veil of "confidence." They have committed too many crimes against the DPRK to enumerate in the first year of their office under this signboard.
					
					 The puppet group has rushed headlong into escalating the confrontation since their seizure of power, saying that the "confidence-building process" would bring about progress in the north-south relations.
					
					 Though six rounds of working-level talks between the authorities of the north and the south took place for resuming the operation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone, the puppet group disturbed them in every way, rendering them fruitless.
					
					 When the north and the south agreed to open their authorities' talks in Seoul, the puppet group put a brake on the issue of opening them over the matter of chief delegate, making them abortive.
					
					 When the situation on the Korean Peninsula was put on an orbit of detente and the inter-Korean relations were in the process of mending thanks to the positive efforts made by the DPRK, the puppet group let loose such provocative remarks that all those successes were ascribable to its "confidence-building process" and its "principled policy towards the north" was pulling the north. Consequently, the working-level talks between authorities of the north and the south for arranging the reunion of separated families and relatives and resuming the tour of Mt. Kumgang were indefinitely put off. 
					
					 Not content with opposing dialogue with the DPRK, the group made no scruple of denying the agreements already reached between the north and the south. 
					
					 The south Korean regime's frantic confrontation of social systems has reached an alarming phase while its smear campaign against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK has gone beyond a tolerance limit under the signboard of "confidence."
					
					 It invited riff-raffs from the U.S. and its neighboring countries styling themselves experts to Seoul and let them say volumes about "possibility of the north's collapse."
					
					 It, at the same time, desperately perpetrated such human rights abuses as conducting operations to allure and abduct inhabitants of the DPRK.
					
					 It has conducted a ceaseless smear campaign against the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence.
					
					 It has brought an unprecedentedly great danger of a nuclear war to this land under the signboard of "confidence" policy.
					
					 Right after it took office, the regime worked out such a document for aggression as the "joint plan for coping with the provocation of a local war" to be followed by a "strategy for annihilating the north's army" through massive missile strikes.
					
					 In October last alone, the south Korean warmongers staged ceaseless military drills in the East, West and South Seas of Korea with a nuclear carrier of the U.S. imperialists involved. They staged joint air logistic drills with U.S. forces for the first time and the largest-ever "Max Thunder" drill with the U.S. air force.
					
					  What merits attention is that the puppet forces have intensified their joint military drills with the Japan "Self-defense Forces" unprecedented in their history.
					
					 Troops of the SDF conducted together with south Korean forces naval drills in the waters southeast of Jeju Island in May. They also staged large-scale joint naval strike maneuvers in the South Sea of Korea in October.
					
					 Meanwhile, the puppet group of south Korea has put spurs to bolstering up its preemptive strike forces as evidenced by its hectic moves to import various types of missiles, warships, reconnaissance drones, bombs for destroying underground bunkers and air tankers. All these facts go to prove that its moves for a nuclear war have reached a more reckless phase in the past one year.
					
					 The south Korean ruling forces would be well advised to stop going reckless if they do not want to meet the same miserable end as that of the preceding dictators.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Great Heyday of Construction This Year
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Great Heyday of Construction This Year
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Juche 102 (2013) has been recorded in the history of the DPRK as a year of great heyday of construction in the era of Kim Jong Un.
					 The first characteristic of the great heyday of construction is the unprecedented speed.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in an article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 In June this year Marshal Kim Jong Un sent a historic appeal to soldier builders of the ski resort on Masik Pass and all other service personnel and people across the country.
					
					 All of them encouraged by the appeal have turned out in creating the "speed on Masik Pass" for great leap and changes in the new century of the Juche era.
					
					 Grand edifices through which people will fully enjoy high civilization in the new era were all erected in a year. They included Unha Scientist Street, apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University, Munsu Water Park, Mirim Riding Club, Okryu Children's Hospital, Ryugyong Dental Hospital and the ski resort on Masik Pass.
					
					 Kim Jong Un gave priority to quality in all buildings while leading the huge construction projects.
					
					 The idea of abiding by the principle of convenience first and architectural beauty next laid out by Kim Jong Un became the first standard in evaluating all the buildings.
					
					 What ran through the great heyday of construction in 2013 were the noble feelings and view on the people possessed by Kim Jong Un who worked hard to provide the most wonderful living conditions to the people as soon as possible by translating the wishes of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il into a reality.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is regarding the great heyday of construction this year which witnessed epoch-making changes as a stage of preparation for the period of great prosperity in construction.
					
					 The great successes made in the field of construction this year are a strong indicator of the period of great prosperity in construction to be ushered in under the grand plan of the WPK.

articles.title: Concession, Yielding to Imperialism Lead to Death: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Concession, Yielding to Imperialism Lead to Death: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- It is a foolish act to harbor an illusion about the imperialists and expect any "reward" from them, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 If a country takes the choice of making compromise with the imperialists, it will end up losing sovereignty and finally go to ruin. This is proved by what happened in Iraq. 
					
					 Once Iraq stood firm against the U.S. However, when the Persian Gulf War started, Iraq began stepping back, taken aback by the U.S. indiscriminate military attacks and bullying tactics. 
					
					 After the war, the U.S. had continued air raids and harsh sanctions for more than a decade, pressurizing Iraq to disarm and surrender.
					
					 Iraq could not but meet the U.S. demands, deterred by the U.S. arms and pressure. The Iraqi leadership accepted the forced inspection of military installations including major facilities of the country as demanded by the U.S. In the end, Iraq allowed the inspection of even the presidential palace. 
					
					 By doing so, Iraq tried to escape the U.S. imperialists' invasion and maintain power. But it was a serious miscalculation. The more concessions Iraq made, the greater ones Washington pushed for. It used to put military pressure on Iraq when the latter failed to do so. 
					
					 Finally in 2003 the U.S. easily toppled the Sadam regime through an invasion against Iraq which was weakened by many years of sanctions and air raids. 
					
					 The same can be said of Libya. 
					
					 Victory in the struggle for independence and progress is in store for the country and nation standing firm against the enemies. 
					
					 This is proved by the history of the Korean people's struggle.

articles.title: No Torpedo Attack Detected during S. Korean Warship "Cheonan" Sinking: Sound-detector
articles.content:
No Torpedo Attack Detected during S. Korean Warship "Cheonan" Sinking: Sound-detector
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- It was confirmed once again that there was no torpedo attack when the south Korean warship "Cheonan" sank. 
					 This fact was disclosed by the then sound-detector of the warship as a witness at the trial held at the Seoul Central District Court on Monday. 
					
					 He said that he had been in the sound-detecting room prior to the sinking of the warship and heard no sound until its sinking. 
					
					 The sonar of the warship was capable of detecting not only submarines but also torpedoes, he claimed, adding that he felt nothing odd till the moment of the accident. 
					
					 In this regard, a lawyer said that the sound of a torpedo propeller would be heard louder in the water and the speed of sound was much faster. It is hardly understandable in the light of common sense that the sonar failed to detect the torpedo approaching the warship, the lawyer held. 
					
					 At the trial, the former section chief of guard of the Agency of Maritime Police, who commanded the operation to salvage the sunken ship, testified to the fact that he was told by the navy before any others that it hit a rock. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities have so far claimed that "Cheonan" was sunk by the torpedo attack of the north. They have desperately kicked up an anti-DPRK confrontation racket, bringing the north-south relations to a total collapse under this pretext. 
					
					 The above-said testimonies confirmed that the sonar found no sign of torpedo attack and the military authorities had known that it was an accident caused by stranding. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to clearly know that the anti-DPRK confrontation row hyped by them on the basis of the fiction about the torpedo attack would only add to their crimes against the nation.

articles.title: End to Irregularities Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
End to Irregularities Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Council of Christian Churches made public a declaration calling for ending corruption and irregularities, according to CBS of south Korea on Dec. 9.
					 The declaration said that those concerned of power organs should take responsibility for their illegal involvement in the "presidential election."
					
					 It called for putting an immediate end to the reckless racket kicked up recently by the present regime for eliminating the "forces following the north" which is aimed to cover up the illegal acts.
					
					 The public broadcasting service reduced to the media serving the "government", it noted, demanding freedom of speech.
					
					 It urged the regime to ensure the freedom of assembly, do away with all discriminations and opt for consolidating legal system so as to ensure human rights.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Declare Actions for Protecting Progressive Teachers Organization
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Declare Actions for Protecting Progressive Teachers Organization
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union and the Action for Protecting Democratic Education and the Teachers Union in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Tuesday denouncing the "government" authorities for moving to stamp out the progressive teachers organization.
					 At the press conference speakers said that the authorities are leaving no stone unturned to crack down on the Teachers Union.
					
					 A teacher deprived of the basic right of human being can not teach students democracy, they said, adding they will struggle against the unreasonable suppression so that the Teachers Union may fully enjoy the right as a trade union.
					
					 They urged the authorities to totally cancel the measure to stamp out the progressive teachers organization and halt the suppression.
					
					At the press conference the organizations declared that they launch overall actions denouncing the authorities for cracking down on the trade union of teachers and distorting history textbook in the name of 21,865 teachers and parents of students.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by S. Koreans
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by S. Koreans
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- South Korean people are praising leader Kim Jong Il's great patriotic life on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.
					 The internet magazine Tendency of Situation and the internet paper Voice of People said that the Juche idea is the political philosophy of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, adding that he formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as the integral system of the idea, theory and method of Juche and applied the Juche idea in the revolution and construction, wisely leading the struggle for the independence of the popular masses.
					
					 The internet website Gate to Northeast Asia in an article titled "NDC Chairman Kim Jong Il and north's future" underscored the immortal ideological and theoretical feats he performed by successfully carrying forward the revolutionary ideas and theories of Kim Il Sung and making distinguished contributions.
					
					 Posted on websites were articles dealing with his undying ideological and theoretical feats.
					
					 Seen on south Korean publications and websites every day are articles on the undying Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il, who honorably defended the gains of socialism, the precious heritage of Kim Il Sung, and turned the DPRK into a single-mindedly united invincible political and ideological power and a matchless military power by pursuing the great Songun politics.
					
					 They are also lauding his field guidance as "all-embracing one" and "storm-like field guidance" the like of which can hardly be provided by any other leader of the world.
					
					 Path of Nation, the organ of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, in an article said Kim Jong Il performed undying feats by ushering in a turning phase of national reunification.
					
					 The South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Solidarity for Progress, the Meeting of Victims of "the Security Law" and other organizations said that the historic feats of Kim Jong Il, who provided a firm landmark for national reunification, will always be remembered by the people.
					
					 Analysts of the situation and media of south Korea were unanimous in saying that Marshal Kim Jong Un would pursue politics based on the idea and leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and steadfastly adhere to the line of reunification based on the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Urges Park Geun Hye to Step down
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Urges Park Geun Hye to Step down
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- A Korean in the U.S. posted an article titled "Regime hell-bent on racket for eliminating forces following the north" on a website on Dec. 3.
					 Many people were disappointed to hear the announcement of the results of the "presidential" election in south Korea last year that Park Geun Hye was elected "president", the article said, and went on:
					
					 If the election had taken a normal course, its outcome would have been otherwise. It was proved recently with convincing evidence that it was a fraudulent election. It is deplorable that Park Geun Hye and her group are labeling those critical of the election rigging as "forces following the north".
					
					 Park, who won the election by garnering illegal votes, is obliged to step down herself as demanded by the public.
					
					 She is stunning the people as she is enforcing a repressive rule, following in the footsteps of Park Chung-hee.
					
					 She has maintained her power through the racket for eliminating the "forces following the north" for almost one year since she became the boss of Chongwadae. There is nothing her team the Saenuri Party has done for the sake of the people.
					
					 For how long she will kick up the racket, the article queried, demanding Park own the responsibility for the election rigging, though belatedly, and step down.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Commemorated Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- There took place meetings, book and photo exhibitions, and film shows in Chile, Brazil and Nigeria between Nov. 29 and Dec. 5 on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display in the venues of the events were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos documenting revolutionary activities of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and photos introducing achievements made by the Korean people in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" and "The Tower of the Juche Idea".
					
					 Eduardo Artes, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action), praised Kim Jong Il for frustrating the imperialists' vicious anti-socialist moves with his iron will and pluck, reliably defending the sovereignty of the country and demonstrating the dignity of the DPRK as an invincible political and military power.
					
					 The chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il noted that the army and people of the DPRK have made great achievements in the efforts for building a thriving nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting in Brazil.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by British Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by British Personage
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, posted on its website an article titled "True son of the people" on December 4 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Jong Il devoted all his life to the happiness of the people as their true son, the article said, and went on:
					
					 He always led a frugal life and shared the destiny with the people.
					
					 He regarded it as an iron rule to believe in the people as in Heaven, the motto of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He made it a principle to bring a flower into bloom even on a rock if the people want to do so.
					
					 The Korean people are fully enjoying a happy life in the paradise provided by Kim Jong Il with his tireless efforts and patriotic devotion.
					
					 I could feel the love for the people shown by him while visiting the DPRK several times.
					
					 A lot of factories, enterprises and leisure complexes have been built in every part of the country to make contributions to improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 All these were the fruition of his warm loving care for the people and wise leadership.
					
					 His boundless devotion was based on the ardent love for the people and absolute trust in them and the iron faith in the validity and victory of the socialist cause.
					
					 Noting that the Korean people are the best in the world, he absolutely trusted in the people. He was convinced of the bright future of the country, saying that let's see who will laugh last.
					
					 Indeed, he was a true son of the people who believed in them as in Heaven and devoted himself to them.

articles.title: Bulgarian Paper Carries Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography
articles.content:
Bulgarian Paper Carries Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The short biography of leader Kim Jong Il was carried by the November issue of the Bulgarian paper Iskra.
					 The paper was illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK Will Strengthen Cooperation with Asian Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Will Strengthen Cooperation with Asian Countries
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Vice-Chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK Kim Wan Su, head of the SPA delegation, made a speech at the Sixth Plenary Session of the Asian Parliamentary Assembly held in Pakistan on December 9.
					 He said that all parliaments of the member nations of the Asian Parliamentary Assembly should make all efforts to successfully carry out their missions in the struggle for building Asia that makes independent, peaceful and sustained development.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The DPRK government and people set the building of an economic power and the improvement of the people's standard of living as their general goal. So, stable and peaceful environment is very precious and essential for the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK is to blame for the vicious cycle of escalated tension that periodically repeats on the Korean Peninsula, and the only way for ensuring durable peace on the peninsula is to put an end to the U.S. policy.
					
					 Consistent is the stand of the DPRK to terminate the escalating tension on the peninsula in a peaceful way through dialogue and negotiations and make a contribution to peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Reunifying the country is the greatest desire and supreme task for the Korean nation.
					
					 Though severe challenges still lie ahead of the DPRK in its efforts for achieving the national reunification and the peaceful development of the country, its people will surely bring a final victory, rallied close around supreme leader Kim Jong Un in one mind.
					
					 The DPRK will steadily develop the good relations with all countries friendly to it in the idea of independence, peace and friendship and always strengthen the cooperation with Asian countries on the preferential basis, in particular.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of Nigerian National Committee for Study of Juche Idea Held
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of Nigerian National Committee for Study of Juche Idea Held
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea held its annual meeting in Abuja on December 3.
					 The meeting reviewed last year's activities of the committee for studying and disseminating Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and discussed its work plan for 2014.
					
					 Speakers vowed to conduct positive activities to introduce and disseminate Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in 2014 marking the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung and the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: RPDC ampliara con preferencia la cooperacion con paises asiaticos
articles.content:
RPDC ampliara con preferencia la cooperacion con paises asiaticos
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En la VI Asamblea Parlamentaria Asiatica que tiene lugar en Pakistan, el jefe de la delegacion de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Wan Su, quien es vicepresidente de ese organo legislativo, pronuncio el dia 9 un discurso.
					Los parlamentos de todos los paises miembros de la Asamblea Parlamentaria Asiatica deberan cumplir perfectamente su mision en la lucha por construir un Asia independiente, pacifica y de desarrollo sostenible.
					
					Para el gobierno y el pueblo de la RPDC que presentan la construccion de potencia economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo como meta general, el ambiente estable y pacifico es lo mas valioso y prioritario.
					
					Debido a la politica hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU., continua en la Peninsula Coreana el circulo vicioso de la agravacion de tensiones y hay que eliminarlo para garantizar la paz duradera de esa Peninsula.
					
					Es invariable la posicion de la RPDC de acabar con la tension de la Peninsula Coreana por via pacifica, o sea, mediante el dialogo y negociaciones y contribuir a la paz y la estabilidad de la region del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					La reunificacion de la patria es el deseo mas grande y tarea suprema de la nacion coreana.
					
					Aunque se enfrentan con graves desafios en el camino por la reunificacion y el desarrollo pacifico del pais, el pueblo coreano lograra sin falta la victoria final uniendose monoliticamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					La RPDC desarrollara las relaciones de amistad con todos los paises que la traten amistosamente segun el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad, en particular, fortalecera con preferencia la cooperacion con los paises asiaticos.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia introduccion de armamentos belicos de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia introduccion de armamentos belicos de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en estos dias, los titeres del Sur de Corea se enfrascan en la introduccion de equipos belicos, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 12 la informacion no. 1056 como sigue:
					Los titeres surcoreanos tratan de introducir los aviones F-35A y Global Hawk, el helicoptero de transporte CH-47D, los misiles de diversos tipos y otros armamentos sofisticados de marca norteamericana.
					
					Luego de ubicar cientos de misiles Spike importados de Israel, pretenden introducir de Alemania, Francia y otros paises gran cantidad de misiles antibalisticos aire-tierra de larga distancia, aviones de reconocimiento y otros pertrechos belicos modernos.
					
					Esta locura imprudente tendente a agudizar la confrontacion militar y la carrera armamentista en la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Nordeste Asiatico y exacerbar la situacion de la region, provoca gran preocupacion y condena del interior y exterior.
					
					Las presentes maniobras de los titeres surcoreanos atribuyen a la coaccion de EE.UU. que trata de controlar mas en lo militar a los titeres y utilizarlos como brigada de choque en la realizacion de su estrategia sobre Asia, asi como venderles mas pertrechos de guerra.
					
					Todos los hechos demuestran claramente que EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana son autores principales que destruyen la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Muy atemorizada ante el poderio militar de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la banda surcoreana actua con frenesi para  aventajarsela en la dotacion tecnica. Pero, esto deviene un acto suicida.
					
					Los militares y civiles coreanos no permitiran las maniobras de confrontacion militar de la banda titere y las frustraran con el poderio del Songun.

articles.title: Cientificos biotecnologicos de Corea logran exitos
articles.content:
Cientificos biotecnologicos de Corea logran exitos
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Los cientificos de la filial de biotecnologia de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea lograron en los ultimos anos los exitos tecnicos sofisticados que tienen gran importancia real.
					Los cientificos del grupo de investigacion de Genom elaboraron en el nivel alto el pedacito de DNA para analizar los microbios patogenos, la bacteria resistente al acido tuberculosa y no  tuberculosa y otras.
					
					Los otros del grupo de investigacion microorganica desarrollaron el medicamento inmunizador contra el cancer de alta eficacia.
					
					Ademas, se lograron numerosos exitos para el desarrollo de la industria biologica del pais inclusive la tecnologia de produccion de patron de los manzanos bajos segun la tecnologia de cultivo separado y de cultivo de tejido sobre las celulas de tronco.
					
					El vicepresidente de dicha filial Kye In Chol dijo a la ACNC que tienen las metas sofisticadas a ser conquistadas en el sector de agricultura, ganaderia, piscicultura, fruticultura y salud publica.
					
					Las tareas son enormes, pero es optimista la perspectiva de su realizacion porque es muy alto el impetu de los cientificos de ganar dignamente en la competencia con el mundo.

articles.title: Fraccionalistas no pueden quedar en filas de unidad monolitica, ratifica ACNC
articles.content:
Fraccionalistas no pueden quedar en filas de unidad monolitica, ratifica ACNC
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hoy dia, todos los militares y civiles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, unidos compactamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, aceleran la marcha general para la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero. 
					En estos tiempos en que se realiza en el maximo nivel la unidad monolitica del partido y las filas revolucionarias, fueron revelados los elementos extranos y casuales que estaban infiltrados en el interior del partido. 
					
					La reunion ampliada del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, efectuada el 8 de diciembre, elimino a la banda de Jang Song Thaek que ampliaba sus filas y desafiaba al partido intentando castrar la direccion unica del partido en el importante periodo de viraje historico de la sucesion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. De esta manera, dio el ataque decisivo a los peligrosos actos fraccionalistas. 
					
					Es inevitable la eliminacion de los fraccionalistas de version moderna. 
					
					El fraccionalismo es el enemigo de la revolucion que trae la division. 
					
					Desde el inicio, la revolucion coreana vino avanzando en medio de la lucha intransigente contra los fraccionalistas que carcomen la unidad de las filas revolucionarias. 
					
					No hay lugar donde vivir de parasito los fraccionalistas y los ambiciosos politicos en una nueva era de la revolucion jucheana en que todos los militares y civiles coreanos unidos compactamente en torno al gran dirigente marchan a galopes hacia el futuro radiante de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					El pueblo coreano confio solo al Presidente Kim Il Sung en el periodo de  la pasada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y de posguerra frustrando los actos antipartidistas de los fraccionalistas. 
					
					Y en el periodo de la marcha penosa, la forzada tambien supero todas las pruebas con la firme conviccion de que vendra  sin falta el dia de la victoria bajo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					En las decadas del siglo pasado dio el golpe demoledor a los fraccionalistas antipartidistas y contrarrevolucionarios y vino consolidando por todos los medios la unidad monolitica cantando la cancion "Levantemos en alto la bandera roja" despues del fallecimiento del Presidente. 
					
					Hoy dia, los integrantes de la tercera y cuarta generacion de la revolucion continuan la tradicion de la unidad monolitica. 
					
					Gracias a tener al gran sucesor, continua sin vacilacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu. 
					
					La unidad monolitica es lo mas importante de la revolucion jucheana.
					
					Despues de eliminar a los fraccionalistas que se oponian al partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo, se ha purificado y consolidado mil veces la unidad monolitica de la RPDC. 
					
					Es invencible la unidad monolitica del partido, el ejercito y el pueblo en torno al lider basada en la unica idea y voluntad.

articles.title: Concesion y subyugacion al imperialismo implican la muerte, advierte Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Concesion y subyugacion al imperialismo implican la muerte, advierte Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual de este jueves, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que es una tonteria tratar con ilusion a los imperialistas y esperar de ellos algun "beneficio". 
					Como demuestra la situacion de Iraq, la conciliacion con el imperialismo causa la privacion de soberania y la muerte, comienza el articulo y continua:
					
					Algun tiempo, Iraq hacia frente con intransigencia a Estados Unidos. Pero, una vez iniciada la guerra del golfo persico, comenzo a retroceder por el pavor al indiscriminado ataque militar y fanfarroneria del imperio. 
					
					Despues de terminada la guerra del golfo, EE.UU. practico durante mas de 10 anos el ataque aereo y la sancion brutal contra Iraq demandandole rendirse desarmado. 
					
					Doblegada ante la fuerza y la presion de EE.UU., la Direccion de Iraq se vio obligada a permitir la inspeccion forzada de los objetos militares incluso las instalaciones importantes del pais y hasta el Palacio Presidencial. 
					
					De esta manera, Iraq intento eludir la invasion armada norteamericana y mantener el poder. Pero, esto fue una gran equivocacion. 
					
					Cada vez que Iraq hacia alguna concesion, EE.UU. le pedia la otra mas grande en compania de presion militar. 
					
					Por fin, en 2003, el imperio cometio la invasion armada al pais persico, debilitado tanto por la sancion y ataque aereo de varios anos, y derroco facilmente el poder de Sadam.
					
					Sucedio lo mismo en el caso de Libia. 
					
					La victoria en la lucha por la independencia y el progreso esta al lado del pais y la nacion que luchan con intransigencia contra los enemigos. 
					
					Lo comprueba la historia de lucha del pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Confirmado en Sur de Corea nuevo testigo de hundimiento de corbeta "Cheonan"
articles.content:
Confirmado en Sur de Corea nuevo testigo de hundimiento de corbeta "Cheonan"
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Quedo confirmada otra vez la verdad de que el buque de guerra surcoreano "Cheonan" no fue atacado por el torpedo.
					Lo revelo el hombre detector de sonido de la mencionada corbeta de aquel entonces en calidad de testigo en el juicio efectuado el dia 9 en el Tribunal Local Central de Seul.
					
					Dijo que hasta el momento de hundimiento de la corbeta estaba en el camarote de deteccion de sonido, pero no escucho ninguna onda sonora.
					
					Senalo que el detector submarino por el sonido, instalado en el buque armado, puede encontrar todos los submarinos y los torpedos y anadio que hasta el momento del incidente no sintio ninguna cosa anormal.
					
					Por el respecto, un abogado insistio en que en el agua se escucha mejor el sonido de la circulacion de impulsor de torpedo y es mucho mas rapida la velocidad de transmision de sonido, razon por la cual no se podia entender con sentido comun el hecho de que no fue detectado el torpedo hasta que se acercaba a la corbeta.
					
					En el curso de juicio de aquel dia, el ex jefe de guardia de Jefatura de Policia Marina, quien  habia mandado el socorro del barco hundido, confeso que habia recibido al principio de las fuerzas navales la informacion de que el barco habia chocado con escollo.
					
					Hasta ahora, la banda titere surcoreana insistio en que "la corbeta Cheonan se hundio por el ataque de torpedo norcoreano" y  pretextandolo interrumpio todas las relaciones intercoreanas y recurrio al escandalo de confrontacion anti-RPDC.
					
					Pero, esta vez se comprobo la verdad de que en aquel entonces el detector acustico no descubrio ningun sintoma de ataque de torpedo y la propia capa militar sabia el hundimiento como incidente causado por el choque con escollo.
					
					La camarilla titere surcoreana debe saber claramente que cuanto mas recurra a la confrontacion anti-RPDC insistiendo en el rumor de ataque de torpedo sin fundamentos, mas se agrandaran sus crimenes antinacionales.
